THATS EXACTLY HOW I FEEL..I USED TO BE A DECENT SIZE BUT NOWIM WAY TOO SMALL! I HATE IT & I TRY TO GAIN WEIGHTBUT NOTHING WORKS

You might want to visit your doctor and make sure you aren't suffering from either juvenile diabetes or hyperthyroidism.  There are simple blood tests that will confirm/rule out either of these issues.  If it's neither of them, you should have your check for other conditions.
